description: The end-to-end set of business processes for receiving and processing customer orders for goods or services and collecting payment.
The end-to-end process of obtaining and managing the raw materials, goods, and services needed to manufacture a product or operate a business, through to payment.
The complete journey of an employee within an organization, from recruitment and onboarding through their tenure, development, and eventual separation.
The process of collecting, processing, and presenting financial data to provide internal and external stakeholders with accurate financial statements and reports.

lifecycleName: Idea to Market / New Product Development (NPD)
description: The complete process of conceiving, designing, developing, testing, and launching new products or services.
The overall process of managing interactions and relationships with current and potential customers to drive sales, improve customer service, and increase retention.
The core day-to-day processes involved in producing goods or delivering services, managing resources, and ensuring operational performance.
